Uses of Class
org.gearvrf.GVRTransform

  • Packages that use GVRTransform 
    Package Description
    org.gearvrf
    You need to understand key points of this package to create a GVRF application.
    org.gearvrf.animation
    GVRF animations, version 2.0.

    • Uses of GVRTransform in org.gearvrf

      Methods in org.gearvrf that return GVRTransform 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GVRTransform GVRSceneObject.getTransform()
      Get the GVRTransform.

    • Uses of GVRTransform in org.gearvrf.animation

      Constructors in org.gearvrf.animation with parameters of type GVRTransform 
      Constructor and Description
      GVRRelativeMotionAnimation(GVRTransform target, float duration, float deltaX, float deltaY, float deltaZ)
      Animate a move by delta x/y/z.
      GVRRotationByAxisAnimation(GVRTransform target, float duration, float angle, float x, float y, float z)
      Use rotateByAxis(float, float, float, float) to do an animated rotation about a specific axis.
      GVRRotationByAxisWithPivotAnimation(GVRTransform target, float duration, float angle, float axisX, float axisY, float axisZ, float pivotX, float pivotY, float pivotZ)
      Use rotateByAxisWithPivot(float, float, float, float, float, float, float) to do an animated rotation about a specific axis with a specific pivot.
      GVRScaleAnimation(GVRTransform target, float duration, float scale)
      Scale the transform, by the same amount in each dimension.
      GVRScaleAnimation(GVRTransform target, float duration, float scaleX, float scaleY, float scaleZ)
      Scale the transform, by potentially different amounts in each dimension.
